DOC.brief_summary: The effect of teledermatology on length of hospital admission, length of stay, 30 day readmission rate, and antibiotic use in patients presenting with cellulitis vs pseudocellulitis in an academic emergency department setting.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Dermatology and Teledermatology Consultations on Length of Hospital Admission, 30 Day Readmission Rate, and Antibiotic Use in Patients Presenting With Cellulitis vs Pseudocellulitis in an Academic Inpatient Setting
DOC.criteria: Over 18 Admission for cellulitislike symptoms, including but not limited to the following: tenderness, redness, swelling, expansive lesion pregnant prisoner
